ECSchema.description: Input classes for the Corridor Modeler engine.

ECEntityClass.description: Model breaking down an entire Typical-section of a Pathway

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Alignment location in context of an Overall Typical Section
Reference to one or more Typical Section Recipes in context of an Overall Typical Section

ECEntityClass.description: Base class representing the recipe of a segment in a Corridor Portion.
Base class for recipes of Travelways
Model breaking down a Typical-section Recipe
Recipes for TravelwaySide elements

ECNavigationProperty.description: The Spatial SubCategory to be referenced by Spatial elements generated from a Typical Section Component

ECEntityClass.description: Point constructs in a TypicalSection portion definition.

ECNavigationProperty.description: The default Spatial SubCategory to be referenced by the 3D Linear generated from a Typical Section Point associated with a Typical Section Point Definition

ECEntityClass.description: Interface to be mixed-in by point classes that can constrain other points.
Interface to be mixed-in by classes that can be constrained by other points.
Base class for Point constructs in a TypicalSection recipe
Point construct in a TypicalSection definition
Proxy for a point that is external to the current recipe and, thus, will be resolved while generating meshes
Mix-in to be supported by segments with a constant TypicalSection recipe.
Mix-in to be supported by segments transitioning between TypicalSections recipes.
MultiAspect to be applied to ITransitionPathwaySegments, optionally specifying mapping between TypicalSectionPoint definitions locally to that segment.
Base class for segments of a Travelway, which is the contiguous spatial portion of a Pathway in direct contact with the moving objects.
Travelway segment with a constant Travelway recipe.
Travelway segment with a variable Travelway recipe.
Base class for a set of physical layers providing structural support to the Travelway.
A segment of a Travelway structure with a constant TravelwayStructure recipe.
Travelway Structure segment with a variable Travelway Structure recipe.

Base class for a Set of physical elements, with their corresponding structural layers, along the side of a Travelway, providing different purposes (e.g. separation, safety, connections to existing terrain, etc).
Generic class for Road/Rail end-condition elements.
Travelway segment with a variable Travelway recipe.
